title: Flash
desc: Turns the flash on while taking a photo

title:
Flash
always on
desc: Keeps the pre-flash on all the time.

title:
Pre-flash
brightness
desc: Brightness of flash before the flash 0-100

title:
Number
of photos
desc: Sets the number of images catured in the sequence

title:
Photo
timer
desc: Sets the timer to countdown before taking each picture

title:
Camera
resolution
desc: Sets the resolution at which images will be captured.

title: Sharpness
desc: Adjust the sharpness. Choose a value between -100 and 100 (Default: 0)

title: Contrast
desc: Adjust the contrast. Choose a value between -100 and 100 (Default: 0)

title: Brightness
desc: Adjust the brightness. Choose a value between 0 and 100 (Default: 50)

title: Saturation
desc: Adjust the saturation. Choose a value between -100 and 100 (Default: 0)

title: ISO
desc: Adjust the value of ISO. Choose a value between 0 and 800 (Default: 0-Auto)

title:
Video
Stabilisation
desc: Enable video stabilisation

title:
Exposure
Compensation
desc: Adjust the exposure compensation level. Choose a value between -25 and 25 (Default: 0)

title:
Exposure
Mode
desc: Choose an exposure mode (Default: auto)

title:
Meter
Mode
desc: Choose the camera’s metering mode. All modes set up two regions: a center region, and an outer region. The major difference between each mode is the size of the center region.

title:
Auto-White
-Balance
desc: Adjust the camera’s auto-white-balance mode

title:
Image
Effect
desc: Choose an image effect

title: Rotation
desc: Adjust the camera’s rotation (Default: 0)

title:
Horizontal
Flip
desc: Flip the camera horizontally

title:
Vertical
Flip
desc: Flip the camera vertically
